0010010100010010 1110111111100101 1 -> sum: 0001010011111000, cout: 1
0010000110000010 1011010111111000 1 -> sum: 1101011101111011, cout: 0
1111010110000100 1100100010010010 1 -> sum: 1011111000010111, cout: 1
1010011101110110 0010111011110000 0 -> sum: 1101011001100110, cout: 0
0101010001110100 0111011111011011 0 -> sum: 1100110001001111, cout: 0
0010011011100101 0110100111110110 1 -> sum: 1001000011011100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
